info.title: OGCIO Payment API
info.description: REST API for OGCIO Payment Service. This API is used by the Payments Building Block to manage payment providers, payment requests and transactions.

bearerAuth.description: JWT token obtained from the authentication service

get.description: Retrieve the JSON Web Key Set (JWKS) containing public keys used to verify JWT tokens. This endpoint is used by services like Journey Builder to validate tokens which are sent through redirects between services.
Check the health status of the payment API service. Returns the current operational status of the service.
Retrieve the current version of the payment API service. Useful for client compatibility checks and debugging The version ID is the build ID and is generated while the pipeline runs.

post.description: Create a new payment provider configuration for the organization. Supports multiple provider types including Stripe, Realex, Bank Transfer, and Open Banking.

links.description: Object containing the links to the related endpoints

href.description: URL pointing to the request itself
URL pointing to the next page of results in a paginated response. If there are no more results, this field may be omitted
URL pointing to the previous page of results in a paginated response. If there are no more results, this field may be omitted
URL pointing to the first page of results in a paginated response
URL pointing to the first page of results in a paginated response

pages.description: It may contain a list of other useful URLs, e.g. one entry for page:'page 1', 'page 2'

totalCount.description: Number representing the total number of available items
